Ver película
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiService } from '../service/api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-movies', templateUrl: './movies.component.html', styleUrls: ['./movies.component.css'] }) export class MoviesComponent implements OnInit { movieTitle: string = ''; data: any = {}; constructor(private apiService: ApiService) { } ngOnInit(): void { } buscarPelicula() { this.apiService.getData(this.movieTitle).subscribe(data => { this.data = data; console.log(this.data); }); } }
